channel.title: Slack on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Slack on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Slack to Cloudant
item.description: Slack’s Integration API and Cloudant’s HTTP API make it simple to store data directly into a Cloudant database without breaking a sweat. This tutorial shows how to create a custom slash command in Slack and how to post it directly to Cloudant. Slack is a messaging and team-working application that is used widely to allow disparate teams of people to chat, share files, and interact on desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms.
